name: CreateDataAttribute
description:
Create a data attribute for a contact or company.

This tool allows you to create a data attribute for a contact or company using the Intercom API. Use this when you need to add a new attribute to store additional information.

parameters.name: intercom_api_version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the Intercom API to use. Options range from '1.0' to '2.9'.

parameters.name: data_attribute_details
parameters.description: A JSON object specifying the data attribute's properties: name, model, data type, description, options, and whether it's messenger writable.

name.description: The name of the data attribute.

model.description: The model that the data attribute belongs to.

data_type.description: The type of data stored for this attribute.

description.description: The readable description you see in the UI for the attribute.

options.description: To create list attributes. Provide a set of hashes with `value` as the key of the options you want to make. `data_type` must be `string`.

messenger_writable.description: Can this attribute be updated by the Messenger

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

name.description: The name of the data attribute.

model.description: The model that the data attribute belongs to.

data_type.description: The type of data stored for this attribute.

description.description: The readable description you see in the UI for the attribute.

options.description: To create list attributes. Provide a set of hashes with `value` as the key of the options you want to make. `data_type` must be `string`.

messenger_writable.description: Can this attribute be updated by the Messenger

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
